# Getting Started Docs

- [Visual Basic strategy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/getting-started/strategy.md): Learn about the .NET team's strategy for development and maintenance of the Visual Basic programming language.

## Get Started

- [Get Started](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/getting-started/index.md): Learn more about: Get started with Visual Basic
- [Additional Resources for Visual Basic Programmers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/getting-started/additional-resources.md): Discover resources on the web for you to learn, ask questions and find out more information about Visual Basic.
